categories.development: Code quality, testing, documentation, and version management
categories.documentation: Document generation, formatting, and frontend design
categories.infrastructure: CI/CD, Docker, containerization, and Git worktrees
categories.ui: Frontend features, animations, styling, and UI analysis
categories.workflow: Multi-phase plugin development and creative workflows
categories.system: Skill management, system configuration, and sync

codebase-documenter.description: Write documentation for codebases including README files, architecture docs, code comments, and API documentation with beginner-friendly templates and best practices.

increment-version.description: Increment semantic version numbers across package.json, Cargo.toml, and tauri.conf.json with automatic git commits.

tech-debt-analyzer.description: Analyze technical debt in codebases - identify code smells, architectural issues, dependency problems, and create comprehensive debt documentation.

test-specialist.description: Write test cases, fix bugs, and improve test coverage for JavaScript/TypeScript applications with unit, integration, and e2e testing strategies.

document-skills.description: Meta-skill for document generation - includes PDF, DOCX, PPTX, and XLSX processing capabilities.

frontend-enhancer.description: Enhance visual design of Next.js applications with modern UI components, color palettes, animations, and responsive layouts.

cicd-pipeline-generator.description: Generate CI/CD pipeline configurations for GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and CircleCI with linting, testing, building, and deployment.

docker-containerization.description: Create Dockerfiles, docker-compose configurations, and container deployment guides for Next.js/Node.js applications.

worktree-manager.description: Manage Git worktrees for parallel development workflows.

new-frontend-feature.description: Scaffold frontend pages/features with TDD approach following established UI patterns with 90%+ test coverage.

tailwind-auditor.description: Audit Tailwind CSS usage for consistent theming - detect hardcoded colors, arbitrary values, and guide file-by-file refactoring.

ui-analyzer.description: Analyze React/TypeScript UI for visual consistency, text hierarchy, and WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility compliance.

ux-animation-guru.description: Implement smooth animations with TDD methodology using Framer Motion and CSS transitions for polished UX.

aesthetic-dreaming.description: Create aesthetic templates without plugins - capture visual design concepts through adaptive questioning for reusable visual systems.

build-automation.description: Orchestrate plugin builds and installation via build script with comprehensive failure handling.

context-resume.description: Load plugin context from handoff files to resume work - parses state, presents summary, routes to continuation skill.

plugin-ideation.description: Adaptive brainstorming for plugin concepts and improvements - creative vision capture for new plugins.

plugin-improve.description: Fix bugs, add features to completed plugins with versioning, backups, regression testing, and changelog automation.

plugin-lifecycle.description: Manage complete plugin lifecycle - install, uninstall, reset, destroy with proper state tracking.

plugin-packaging.description: Create branded PKG installers for plugin distribution with automated installation and Gatekeeper bypass.

plugin-planning.description: Orchestrate Stage 0 research and planning for JUCE plugins - create architecture.md and plan.md contracts.

plugin-testing.description: Validate audio plugins through automated tests, pluginval, or manual DAW testing for crashes and parameter issues.

plugin-workflow.description: Orchestrate JUCE plugin implementation through stages 1-3 (Foundation, DSP, GUI) with automatic validation.

ui-mockup.description: Create WebView UI mockups for audio plugins through iterative design and implementation scaffolding.

ui-template-library.description: Manage aesthetic templates - save visual systems from mockups as interpretable prose, apply to new plugins.

workflow-reconciliation.description: Reconcile workflow state files to ensure checkpoints are properly updated and prevent state drift.

deep-research.description: Multi-agent parallel investigation for complex JUCE problems with graduated depth protocol (local, web, parallel).

troubleshooting-docs.description: Capture solved problems as categorized documentation with YAML frontmatter for fast searchable lookup.

system-setup.description: Validate and configure dependencies for Plugin Freedom System - Python, CMake, JUCE, pluginval with auto-installation.

skill-sync.description: Sync Claude skills from GitHub repository - check for updates, pull latest, manage local cache.
